file_content.text: The Great Hunt begins. Earn your glory!
The melee is over! One hunter remains!
Quite a show you put on. Blasted fun to watch. How do you feel, hunter?
I want to know everything about the Great Hunt.
Cut the small talk.
Patience. Bask in your victory for a moment.
I just stomped my competition into the dirt. I feel great.
Like a winner.
Enjoy it. Things only get harder from here.
Feelings are for the weak.
I don't feel anything.
Feelings are for women and children.
I don't feel anything.
Ha! Couldn't have said it better myself.
Huntmaster?
Let the hunter stand before me. She is honored beyond all common hunters.
Let the hunter stand before me. He is honored beyond all common hunters.
Let it be known that--
This is simply ridiculous. I mean, really--this needs to stop right now.
Blood. Come here and face me.
This ends now.
Are we starting the hunt already?
Glad you could make it.
You die, scum!
Kill!
No, no! No unsanctioned kills in the Great Hunt!
You see? That's a perfect example.
I must object to this farce. That... thing... does not deserve to enter the Great Hunt.
I object to this farce. This ignorant thug does not deserve to enter the Great Hunt.
Her credentials are a lie fabricated by her little gutter rat of a sidekick. She deserves no honors.
His credentials are a lie fabricated by his little gutter rat of a sidekick. He deserves no honors.
You lying, cheating, murdering scum!
We know this hunter's history, Blood. The Huntmaster has ruled.
You fools! This is a place of honor, a competition of elites. Mandalore will hear of this!
I'm ready to settle this right now. How about you?
Running away, then?
You're an emotional boy.
If you feel so strongly about it, fight the Huntmaster.
Take it up with the Wookiee.
Enough! Before this Great Hunt is over, I will have your skull in my hands!
The Great Hunt just got way more interesting. Sorry to interrupt, Huntmaster. Please continue.
The Great Hunt proves talent, resolve. Mandalore calls it to bring him the most skilled hunter in the galaxy.
Each hunter will hunt the other's prey. Then each hunter hunts the other.
At the end, there is no prey and only one hunter.
You get all that, hunter?
What happens when I win this contest?
He left out the big prize.
Fame, glory, wealth--and a chance to work with Mandalore, the greatest leader in the galaxy.
Maybe you want to sum it up for me?
I think so.
All right, I'll try. But without the flowery stuff....
Just tell me that Tarro Blood is my prey.
I want to kill Tarro.
If he isn't yet, he will be eventually.
You'll be hunting targets spread across the galaxy. There will be at least one other hunter going after them, too.
You not only have to take down your target, you have to eliminate the other hunters.
What if I don't get to my targets first?
And if I'm late?
Then you'll have hunters gunning for you instead of the other way around.
I'm supposed to execute my fellow hunters?
You want me to kill them?
You only have to eliminate them from the Great Hunt. Surrender isn't typical, but it's accepted.
Got it.
Today you are truly the hunter, and all else is your prey. Welcome to the Great Hunt.
Your handler Crysta will fill you in on the rest of the details. She's waiting for you.
--and the last hunter left standing joins the Great Hunt. Simple as that.
All weapons are allowed, but you fight alone. No assistants. And it looks like we have a latecomer!
Somebody made up a story I was dead.
You were misinformed.
Your competitors were relieved to hear it. Too bad for them, huh?
I just like to make a big entrance.
I'm not late.
Coming back from the dead is a big entrance, all right.
I hope you idiots are ready to die.
Let's finish this, morons.
Killing isn't strictly necessary, but it's well within the rules.
Huntmaster, will you do us the honor?
Today, many hunters earn glory in death and defeat. One hunter earns eternal glory in victory.
Good hunting to all!
We all heard tales of your exploits, hunter. Perhaps I'll turn them into a song to commemorate your death.
That confident, are you?
You're a cocky one.
Confidence breeds victory.
Make sure it's something you can dance to.
I like my songs festive.
Consider it done.
I'll do the same. You prefer ballads or war chants?
Right back at you.
I prefer to win.
I'd wish you luck, but it wouldn't help. So, I'll just say goodbye.
Enough! You hunters are the best that the galaxy's goons and thug lords could send us.
Now show us which one of you will join the Great Hunt. Fight!
Luck be with you, hunter.
Quiet! Quiet, you dogs!
The Huntmaster is about to speak. Pay attention and show some respect for once in your lives!
The Great Hunt is upon us! Many will hunt. Many will die. All will win glory and honor!
Today, we have too many hunters. All must compete. Only one joins the Great Hunt!
You heard the Huntmaster. You're competing for the last spot in the Great Hunt by taking down three bounties on Dromund Kaas.
You expect us to hunt here? With Imperials crawling all over us? And Sith?
Let the man talk. I want to hear this.
It's a job like any other.
Sith can be killed.
The jungles here are secluded and dark. We'll have all the privacy we need.
If you're afraid to compete, the spaceport's thataway.
Somebody sounds scared.
Yes! That's the spirit!
For all you overblown, useless, no-talent cowards, we installed a handy exit door. Use it now.
The rest of you--the real hunters--go see your handlers. They'll get you oriented to the planet and assign you three unique bounties.
Everyone who takes down all three of their bounties wins a spot in the final melee. Anyone who doesn't get all three is out.
Hunting on Dromund Kaas? That's suicide.
I'm grabbing the first shuttle out of here. I suggest you do the same, friend.
Do I look like a coward to you?
You think I'm scared?
No, you look like a kid with fire in her eyes. The kind who gets herself killed.
No, you look like a kid with fire in his eyes. The kind who gets himself killed.
I want into the Great Hunt, and this is the only way.
Not an option.
Then watch your back. It's not the jungles that are dangerous on Dromund Kaas--it's the people.
You'll be one less body for me to step over.
You won't be missed.
At least you've got the attitude right. Don't expect this world to roll over for you, though.
I'm done here. May your quarry fall before you, hunter.
What are you standing around for? Back to your handler! That's Crysta for you, new blood!
To hunt is to live. This is the truth.
Grrowwl!
Imperial soldiers are looking for you. Deal with it.
